alert.note: Alert for Upper Jefferson; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 1:51PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Orleans and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 215 PM CDT... At 151 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Metairie, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Metairie, Avondale, Jefferson, Harahan, Elmwood, Bridge City and River Ridge. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 222 and 233. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
